1360960.name: Glum Buster
1360960.description:
Take a mind-bending trip through a mysterious, haunting alternate reality. Use your newly discovered magic, wits, and curiosity to cleanse the world of glum and find a way back to your family. Experience the wonder of this 2009 AIGF Showcase winner and indie cult classic.

  • Hauntingly beautiful pixel art graphics.
  • Gorgeous, immersive music and SFX.
  • 5 huge areas to explore, packed with mind-bending action/platforming puzzles.
  • Loads of secrets to discover.
  • Unique play mechanisms to learn and master.
  • An unforgettable experience that sticks with you long after you play.
